attributes.action: Make employers reply to all job vacancy applicants a candidate applied for .
attributes.background:
not knowing whether you have been successful in a job application can be very stressful .
So applicants continue to apply for positions .
Job hunting is a very stressful at the best of times .

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's about something the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for. This is the responsibility of employers.

You could start a new petition calling on the Government to regulate recruitment processes if that's something you would like to see happen.
